content:
Theorem 5.11 in the paper — see the part in red.
image.png
Does ◇' have to obey Γ as well? Should we explicitly require it?

I apologize for asking this question without checking the code first.
Unfortunately, I was unable to locate this metatheorem in the repository.
Yes, one should state this explicitly. I have made a PR to fix the typo.
Martin Dvořák has marked this topic as resolved.
